Document.Focus: Calorie count - sodas and energy drinks

Synonyms.Synonym: Weight loss - calorie count - sodas and energy drinks
Overweight - calorie count - sodas and energy drinks
Obesity - calorie count - sodas and energy drinks

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Calorie count - sodas and energy drinks
QAPair.Answer:
It is easy to have a few servings of soda or energy drinks a day without thinking about it. Like other sweetened drinks , the calories from these drinks can add up quickly. Most provide little or no nutrients and contain large amounts of added sugar. Soda and energy drinks can also have large amounts of caffeine and other stimulants, so it is best to limit how much you drink. Here is a list of some popular sodas and energy drinks, their serving sizes, and the number of calories in each. BEVERAGE SERVING SIZE CALORIES Soda
